info.name: Wedding Auth API - Menus
info.description: Complete API collection for Menu Management with Casbin RBAC authorization. Includes hierarchical menu structure with role-based access control.

item.name: Menus

request.description:
Retrieve paginated list of menus with optional filters:
- per_page: Number of items per page (default: 15)
- is_active: Filter by active status
- parent_only: Show only parent menus
- role: Filter menus by role name

**Authorization:** Requires Casbin permission (menus, GET)
- super_admin: Full access
- admin: Read only

response.name: Success Response

request.description:
Get hierarchical menu tree structure with parent-children relationships.

**Query Parameters:**
- is_active: Filter by active status (default: true)
- role: Filter menus by role name

**Authorization:** Requires Casbin permission (menus, GET)

exec: // Save the created menu ID for later use

request.description:
Create a new menu item with optional role assignments.

**Request Body:**
- name: Menu name (required)
- slug: URL-friendly slug (required, unique)
- icon: Icon name (optional)
- url: Menu URL (optional)
- parent_id: Parent menu ID for submenu (optional)
- order: Display order (optional, default: 0)
- is_active: Active status (optional, default: true)
- roles: Array of role names (optional)

**Authorization:** Requires Casbin permission (menus, POST)
- Only super_admin can create menus

response.name: Success Response
Validation Error

request.description:

request.description:
Update an existing menu. All fields are optional, only send the fields you want to update.

If `roles` is provided, it will replace all existing role assignments.

**Authorization:** Requires Casbin permission (menus, PUT)
- Only super_admin can update menus
